about_the_game:
SHATTERED DREAMS

The current game includes two songs and riddles to challenge your mind and entertain you. Get it now at a lower price—future episodes are coming, and the price will increase as the game grows. Buy early and save! The next episode drops this January.

Shattered Dreams is a story-driven puzzle game that invites you into a world of mystery, self-discovery, and emotional depth. You play as a man who wakes up after a devastating accident, with no memory of what happened. As you explore the world around you, you’ll need to solve puzzles, uncover hidden clues, and listen carefully to the lyrics of songs—each one a piece of the puzzle leading you closer to the truth.

In each episode, the game challenges you to unravel the mysteries of your past. Every puzzle you solve brings you one step closer to understanding what happened on the night of the accident, but things are not as they seem. As you dig deeper, you will face challenges, confrontations, and unexpected twists that keep you on edge.

Shattered Dreams is a journey through the unknown, where the answers are hidden in plain sight—and often, in the music that plays throughout your journey. The emotional weight of the story builds with each riddle and lyric, pulling you deeper into a narrative full of secrets and mysteries waiting to be uncovered.

Unique Gameplay: Solve puzzles hidden in the lyrics of a powerful soundtrack. The music isn't just background noise—it’s key to unravelling the mystery.

Emotional Journey: Shattered Dreams offers a rich, emotional narrative that will keep you invested and engaged from start to finish.

Indie Passion: As an indie game, this project is driven by a small, passionate team dedicated to creating something unique and memorable.

Demo Available on December 10th: Experience the beginning of the journey with the demo, coming soon to Steam, and get a taste of the mystery that awaits.

With your support, we’ll bring Shattered Dreams to life and create the full experience, with all the puzzles, music, and story moments we’ve dreamed of. Help us turn this emotional journey into a reality.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game features scenes of peril and character death, including drowning and other forms of accidental or environmental death. While there is no explicit violence, the consequences of player choices may lead to character fatalities, depicted in a non-graphic manner.

There are no depictions of sexual acts, assault, drug or alcohol abuse, or self-harm within the game. However, players sensitive to themes of character mortality should be aware of these elements.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570 / AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 / AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 12

short_description: A story-driven puzzle game where players unravel the mystery of a tragic accident by solving riddles and uncovering clues hidden in the lyrics of haunting songs.
